ext_descriptions.ext_description: A transition_feature_solid is a type of shape_aspect , solid_model, and selected_geometric_element. It is the result of a CAD operation on a solid_model, which blends two surfaces to create a transition surface on the new solid. The selected_geometric_element provides an attribute for identifying the edge to be used in the blending operation. This edge is not part of the resulting solid, but must be captured to enable recreation of the transition_feature_solid in a receiving CAD system.

An edge_blend is a type of transition_feature_solid which provides a transition surface between two surfaces that intersect in an edge. This entity is a solid_model in which the transition surface forms parts of its boundary.

An edge_blend_fillet is an edge_blend that provides a smooth surface as a transition between two surfaces that intersect in an edge, which is one of the boundary curves of a concave region. The edge_blend_fillet operation adds material to the original solid_model.
An edge_blend_fillet_constant_radius is an edge_blend_fillet in which the radius of the fillet is fixed.

An edge_blend_round is an edge_blend that provides a smooth surface as a transition between two surfaces that intersect in an edge, which is one of the boundary curves of a convex region. The edge_blend_round operation removes material from the original solid_model.
An edge_blend_round_constant_radius is an edge_blend_round in which the radius of the fillet is fixed.

An edge_blend_chamfer is an edge_blend solid which creates a beveled surface between two surfaces. The surfaces intersect in an edge that is a boundary curve of a convex region. The edge_blend_chamfer operation adds material to the original solid_model.
